TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CreateUserWizardStep extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep
Public NotInheritable Class CreateUserWizardStep Inherits TemplatedWizardStep

summary.span: 包含用于在可以模板化的步骤中创建用户的基本功能。

span.span: Contains basic functionality for creating a user in a step that can be templated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制网站的用户数据存储区中创建新的用户帐户。The control creates new user accounts in a Web site's user data store. ，默认情况下为中的第一步控件。The is, by default, the first step within the control. 步骤是必需的步骤中控件。The step is a required step within the control. 类派生自类。The class is derived from the class. 穦 控制之前步骤。The is displayed in the control before the step. > [!NOTE] > 尽管步骤是默认情况下该向导的第一步，而是可以提供不同的第一步。Although the step is the first step in the wizard by default, it is possible to provide a different first step. 这样做，但是，可能会影响是否**上一步**显示按钮。Doing so, however, can affect whether the **Previous** button is displayed. 例如，如果步骤不具有自定义导航模板，并呈现之前的另一个步骤前面，然后**上一步**上显示按钮在运行时的步骤。For example, if the step does not have a custom navigation template, and is preceded by another step that is rendered before , then the **Previous** button is displayed on the step at run time. 如果步骤呈现之前备用"first"步骤中，则**上一步**按钮不会显示。If the step is rendered before the alternate "first" step, then the **Previous** button is not displayed. 此外，**上一步**按钮永远不会在设计时呈现。Furthermore, the **Previous** button is never rendered at design time. 如果你想**上一步**按钮在设计时呈现，必须将其添加到的自定义导航模板步骤。If you want the **Previous** button to be rendered at design time, you must add it to the custom navigation template of the step. 您可以修改步骤以包含其他字段，或更改中包含的字段的显示顺序步骤中，通过编辑与控件关联的模板。You can modify the step to contain additional fields, or change the display order of the fields included in the step, by editing the template associated with the control. 当用户单击新的网站用户帐户数据存储中创建**下一步**按钮步骤。The new Web site user account is created in the data store when the user clicks the **Next** button on the step. 默认情况下属性设置为`false`以防止用户返回到步骤并意外地尝试创建另一个用户帐户使用相同的凭据。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果您设置属性设置为`true`，必须在你要删除之前用户返回到此步骤中，最初创建的用户帐户或要允许用户编辑他或她原先输入的信息的应用程序中包含逻辑。If you set the property to `true`, you must include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered. ## Examples 第一个代码示例使用简短形式的声明性语法类添加到的其他控制控件。The first code example uses the short-form declarative syntax of the class to add an additional control to a control. 代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 在网页中的用户输入可能包含恶意客户端脚本。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入，以确保输入不包含 HTML 元素或脚本。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要启用了此验证，您不需要显式检查的脚本或用户输入中的 HTML 元素。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 第二个代码示例列出了完整控件。The second code example lists the complete control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/CS/createuserwizardstepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/VB/createuserwizardstepvb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 在网页中的用户输入可能包含恶意客户端脚本。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入，以确保输入不包含 HTML 元素或脚本。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要启用了此验证，您不需要显式检查的脚本或用户输入中的 HTML 元素。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户从 控件中的后一个步骤返回到当前步骤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a control.

value.span: 如果允许用户返回 步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the step; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`false`以防止用户返回到步骤并意外地尝试创建另一个用户帐户使用相同的凭据。The property is set to `false` to keep users from returning to the step and accidentally trying to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果重写属性并将其设置为`true`，应将逻辑包括在删除之前用户返回到此步骤中，最初创建的用户帐户或允许用户编辑信息，他或她的应用程序中最初输入。If you override the property and set it to `true`, you should include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件的 步骤显示的用户界面 (UI) 的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) to display for the step of a control.
The enumeration value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要显示的用户帐户创建步骤的导航选项控件。The property specifies the navigation options to display for the user-account-creation step of the control. 属性确定哪些控件的导航按钮上显示控件。The property determines which of the control's navigation buttons are displayed on the control. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您尝试更改属性以外的其他任何值的值枚举，将引发。If you attempt to change the property to any value other than the value of the enumeration, an will be thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

exception.span: 尝试将 属性设置为 枚举值以外的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to a value other than the enumeration value.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的用户帐户创建步骤的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.

value.span: 控件的用户帐户创建步骤的标题。

span.span: The title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.
The default value is "Sign up for your new account."

value.span: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

span.span: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
